author: Eric Niiler
title: Modified Sleep Apnea Machines May Ease the Ventilator Crunch
description: Preparing for surges of Covid-19 patients, health care workers are turning to retrofitted versions of devices that are plentiful and approved for use.
content: As hospital administrators and public health officials scramble to meet a shortage of ventilators for Covid-19 patients, teams of doctors, engineers, and DIYers are filling some gaps by modifying breathing machines that are relatively plentiful, such as those… [+5471 chars]
